attributes.action: hold a public inquiry into an alleged bogus investigation done by the Police after I reported, gave details of and supplying documented evidence to support allegations of neglect within a Special Needs School for Children with Profoundly Mental and Physical Disabilities, funded by my Local Education Authorities.  I have not named the LEA or the Police force in question for legal reasons, but believe names are irrelevant.  What I ask should apply to any LEA and Police force, who collude to hide the truth.
